MENU_MANAGER_DESCRIPTION: Manage your restaurant menu categories — update names, upload images, publish or unpublish, and view details easily.
ENGLISH_NAME_MIN_LENGTH: English name must be at least 2 characters
ARABIC_NAME_MIN_LENGTH: Arabic name must be at least 2 characters
HEBREW_NAME_MIN_LENGTH: Hebrew name must be at least 2 characters
IMAGE_URL_INVALID: Image must be a valid URL
DELETE_CATEGORY_QUESTION: Are you sure you want to delete this category? This action cannot be undone.
PUBLISH_CATEGORY_QUESTION: Are you sure you want to publish this category?
UNPUBLISH_CATEGORY_QUESTION: Are you sure you want to unpublish this category?
MENU_ITEMS_MANAGER_DESCRIPTION: Add, edit, or remove menu items within each subcategory — manage names, descriptions, prices, availability, and publishing status effortlessly.
ENGLISH_DESC__MIN_LENGTH: English desc must be at least 10 characters
ARABIC_NDESC_MIN_LENGTH: Arabic desc must be at least 10 characters
HEBREW_NDESC_MIN_LENGTH: Hebrew desc must be at least 10 characters
DELETE_MENU_ITEM_QUESTION: Are you sure you want to delete this menu item?
PUBLISH_MENU_ITEM_QUESTION: Are you sure you want to publish this menu item?
UNPUBLISH_MENU_ITEM_QUESTION: Are you sure you want to unpublish this menu item?
